trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar ljudinspelning som är associerade med en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En taligenkänningen genererar information om ljud indata som en del av recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: För att komma åt tolkade ljuduppspelningen använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metoden i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Ett recognition resultat kan produceras av följande händelser och metoder för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser:-händelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition resultatet som produceras av emulerade taligenkänning inte innehåller känd ljud.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: För sådana recognition resulterar i att dess <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>egenskapen returnerar `null` och dess <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metoden genererar ett undantag.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om emulerade taligenkänning finns i `EmulateRecognize` och `EmulateRecognizeAsync` metoder för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar platsen i Indataströmmen ljud för start av tolkade ljud.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen refererar till position i början av frasen i inkommande enheten genererade ljudström.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Däremot kommer den `RecognizerAudioPosition` -egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klasser referera den tolken position inom dess ljudinsignal.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Dessa platser kan vara olika.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [med tal Recognition händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>egenskapen hämtar systemtiden i början av åtgärden igenkänning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Platsen i ljud Indataströmmen för start av tolkade ljud.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ljud Indataströmmen varaktighet för tolkade ljud.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet i Indataströmmen ljud för tolkade ljud.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ljuduppspelningen bearbetas av motorn för ett format.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Formatet för ljud som bearbetas av taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Väljer och returnerar en del av den aktuella identifieras ljud som binära data.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Startpunkten ljuddata som ska returneras.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Längden på segmentet som ska returneras.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett underavsnitt tolkade ljud som definieras av audioPosition och duration .

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositionoch duration definiera ett segment av ljud utanför intervallet för det aktuella segmentet.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Aktuellt identifieras ljud inte innehåller några data.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar systemtiden i början av recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StartTime hämtas system i början av recognition åtgärden, vilket kan vara användbart för beräkningar av svarstid och prestanda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen hämtar platsen i den indataenhet genererade ljudström.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Systemtiden i början av recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Skriver hela ljud till en dataström som rådata.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Ljud data skrivs till `outputStream` i binär form.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Ingen rubrikinformation tas med.

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Metoden WriteToAudioStream använder Wave-format, men innehåller inte Waw-huvudet.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill inkludera Waw-huvudet använder den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Dataströmmen som tar emot ljuddata.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Skriver ljud till en dataström i Wave-format.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Ljud data skrivs till `outputStream` i Wave-format, som innehåller en resurs interchange format (RIFF) filhuvudet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>metoden använder samma binärt format, men inte Waw-huvudet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Dataströmmen som tar emot ljuddata.
